messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] pa portfolio
messages.msgSnippet: ... Whose idea is this stupid portfolio, anyhow?  Who cares it they didn t copy well, that s a big piece of what she did.  Just toss them in and let the powers
messages.messageBody:
12/17/02 11:10:

> Dd wrote letters to legislators telling him why she thinks the
> homeschool law should be changed, but she wrote it on bright pink
> postcards and it didn't photocopy well. I didn't have the heart to
> ask her to re-write just for the portfolio, but wouldn't that have
> been a cool thing to include? lol

Whose idea is this stupid portfolio, anyhow? Who cares it they didn't copy
well, that's a big piece of what she did. Just toss them in and let the
powers that be cope with it!

brenda
